name: UPRT PTY LTD
about: UPRT PTY LTD is a specialized flying school dedicated to providing comprehensive Upset Prevention and Recovery Training (UPRT) to pilots of all levels. Our courses, aligned with global aviation safety standards, include both theoretical and practical training to prevent and recover from aircraft upsets. Led by experienced instructors, we offer tailored programs for various license holders, from recreational to commercial pilots. Our training environment is controlled, safe, and positive, ensuring pilots develop the necessary skills to handle unexpected events and prevent Loss of Control-Inflight (LOC-I) accidents. With a passion for improving aviation safety, we collaborate with global regulators and stakeholders to make LOC-I accidents a thing of the past. At UPRT PTY LTD, we are committed to enhancing pilot skills and safety.
